scripts.compile: cd shared && yarn run compile && cd ..&& cd viewer && yarn run compile --define process.env.GOJS_KEY="$1" && cd .. && cd extension && yarn run vscode:prepublish
scripts.test: cd shared && yarn run test && cd .. && cd viewer && yarn run test && cd .. && cd extension && yarn run test
scripts.tslint: cd shared && yarn run tslint && cd .. && cd viewer && yarn run tslint && cd .. && cd extension && yarn run tslint
